scripts.docker-build: npm run build && docker build -t toomanycaptains/scanner .
scripts.docker-run: ssh crew@starship 'docker stop scanner && docker rm scanner && docker run --privileged -dit --restart unless-stopped -v /dev/bus/usb:/dev/bus/usb --name scanner toomanycaptains/scanner'
scripts.docker-upload: docker save toomanycaptains/scanner | ssh crew@starship 'docker load'
scripts.upload: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-upload && npm run docker-run
